@type.description: The type must be 'Agreement' for ODRL Agreement policies.

assigner.description: The assigner of the agreement. Required for Agreement policies as it represents one of the agreeing parties.

assignee.description: The assignee of the agreement. Required for Agreement policies as it represents the other agreeing party.

description: Interface representing an ODRL Agreement Policy. An Agreement is a policy where both assigner and assignee have agreed to the terms. Both parties are required to establish the binding nature of the agreement.
